snippet: NASA will launch its next robotic rover to Mars in the summer of 2020, agency officials announced on Tuesday.
abstract: NASA announces that it will launch its next robotic rover to Mars in the summer of 2020; $1.5 billion program will largely reuse the same design as Curiosity rover.
lead_paragraph: NASA will launch its next robotic rover to Mars in the summer of 2020, agency officials announced on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Another Rover Bound for Mars in 2020
headline.main: Another Rover Bound for Mars in 2020
headline.print_headline: Another Rover Bound For Mars In 2020
